description: Students survey the solo art song repertoire of France, England, the United States,
and the Nordic countries. This course highlights the significant features and development of the
art song, and provides context, approaches, and resources for studying this literature. Course work
includes in-class performance. Prerequisite: Music 214, 241, 242, or permission of instructor.
Preferred prerequisite: Music 263, 264. Offered Spring Semester 2009-10 and alternate years.
